TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content:
*GLaDOS voice*

You useless thing that they call LEGO. Not worthy of testing. Oh well, maybe it will entertain my turretets... ha ha.... fat chance...
starts trying to break out of the elevator desperately hoping i won't be used as a test subject.
Wonders what the hell is in the elevator and how cool the tiny floating submarine is, starts to chase it!

uses magic to keep the submarine out of your reach and says "you can't tell what i am?"

(lol)
Sits in the corner and plays KSP on laptop
Well, this is a very quiet elevator...
"Hey, are you like, the planet Kerbin?....Cool, cool, I've been to you, bit quiet in the evenings, but the rockets and planes, wow, some awesome stuff going on there"

Space. Space. Going to space. Can't wait. [humming] Orbit. Space orbit. In my space suit. Atmosphere. Black holes. Astronauts. Nebulas. Jupiter. The Big Dipper. The Big Dipper! I love space. I know! Spell it! S... P... AACE. Space. Space. Ba! Ba! Ba ba ba! Space! Ba! Ba! Ba ba ba! Space! Yes. Please. Space.

...

SPAAAAAAAACE!!

Space. Space. Going to space. Can't wait. [humming] Orbit. Space orbit. In my space suit. Atmosphere. Black holes. Astronauts. Nebulas. Jupiter. The Big Dipper. The Big Dipper! I love space. I know! Spell it! S... P... AACE. Space. Space. Ba! Ba! Ba ba ba! Space! Ba! Ba! Ba ba ba! Space! Yes. Please. Space. ... SPAAAAAAAACE!!
/Thread, Now what adventure might happen here? TO THE STARS!
Busy, crashing a rover.
I am also busy... PRACTICING THE ARTISTIC ALCHEMY THAT HAS BEEN PASSED DOWN THE ARMSTRONG LINE FOR GENERATIONS.
Asks you kindly to please stop shouting!
Wonders why everyone is a 2D square.
Allow myself to be picked up for future planting upon the Mun.
picks you up and plants you in the elevator instead
wipes sweat from forehead upon realizing that's a submarine, afterall
"you look like your freezing to death out there!"(you probably can't notice the submarine has chemical engines on it )

Pull out an M-16 and say:

AND NOW... YOU DIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!
and then shoot the horse till its ded
Joins CombustibleSanic in killing the horse
"Hey, don't kill the horse with an M-16! Use your fists instead!" *starts to punch the horse*
*High-fives TheHockeyPlayer*
Asks "What are you pointing at?" "Whats that orange thingie?"
Tell a story about how people keep using me for there own selfish desires, and the next person to use me might find themselves stuck inside me.
The post above this one takes affect. Then we fight to the death. with our bare hands
Tries to squeeze 15 kerbals and a colony ship into the elevator.
